Class DepthCharge

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.subsink.Entity
            • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.subsink.DepthCharge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DepthCharge
extends Entity
    A DepthCharge is the entity representing the weapons the player drops. It will sink downwards and destroy any submarine it touches.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
